hero.title: Expert Professionals
hero.subtitle: Connect with skilled professionals for all your home and office needs - from carpentry to architecture, plumbing to electrical work, all in one place.

services.joinNetwork: Join our network of skilled professionals and connect with clients in your area.
services.expertServicesSubtitle: Find the right professional from our vast network who are ready to help with your projects.
services.carpenterDescription: Expert carpentry services for all your wooden furniture, fixtures, and structural needs.
services.masonDescription: Expert masonry services for construction, repairs, and decorative stone work.
services.plumberDescription: Complete plumbing solutions for installation, repairs, and water system maintenance.
services.electricianDescription: Expert electrician service for all kinds of electrical work and maintenance

footer.tagline: Connect with skilled professionals for all your service needs.
footer.address: SMVDU, Kakrayal Katra Reasi, Jammu & Kashmir

howItWorks.title: How GoBuild Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Finding and booking professional services has never been easier. Our streamlined process ensures you get quality work with minimal hassle.

step1.title: Find the Right Professional
step1.description: Search through our vast network of verified professionals based on your specific needs and project requirements.

step2.title: Book the Service
step2.description: Choose a convenient date and time from the professional's availability, and customize your booking to match your project needs.

step3.title: Get the Job Done
step3.description: Meet your professional and complete your project to your satisfaction with our quality guarantee.

satisfactionGuarantee.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfactionGuarantee.description: If you're not completely satisfied with the service, we'll work to make it right or refund your payment. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from real customers who found exceptional professionals through GoBuild.

testimonial1.quote: I needed a carpenter urgently and found a professional within an hour. The work was excellent and the price was fair. Very happy!
testimonial1.name: Tirath Das Dogra

testimonial2.quote: The carpenter hired through HandyHub was exceptional. The attention to detail on our custom cabinet was beyond expectations. Very professional!
testimonial2.name: Anjali Abrol

testimonial3.quote: Working with an architect from HandyHub transformed our remodeling project completely. The ideas were innovative and the execution was flawless.
testimonial3.name: Shah Faisal

featuredProfessionals.title: Meet Our Top Professionals
featuredProfessionals.subtitle: These skilled individuals have consistently delivered exceptional work and earned excellent reviews from customers like you.

hero.title: About GoBuild
hero.subtitle: We connect skilled professionals with customers who need quality services. Our platform makes it easy to find, book, and manage service providers for all needs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At GoBuild, we're on a mission to revolutionize access to services by creating a platform that seamlessly connects skilled professionals with customers in need.
mission.description2: We believe everyone deserves access to quality services at fair prices, while providing professionals with opportunities to grow their business and showcase their expertise.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We're committed to delivering exceptional quality in everything, from platform features to customer support.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build trust through transparency, reliability, and always prioritizing our users' best interests.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster a supportive community where professionals and customers can connect and grow together.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace creativity and forward-thinking to continuously improve and evolve our platform.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with honesty and strong moral principles, ensuring ethical practices in all we do.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe great things happen when people work together toward a shared goal.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: Let's get in touch
contactUs.description: Have questions about our services? Fill out the form and we'll be in touch as soon as possible.

toast.title: Message sent!
toast.description: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
